headline: Bristol City Women sign Northern Ireland international Jackie Burns
summary: Bristol City have signed Northern Ireland international goalkeeper Jackie Burns, following her departure from Reading. The 27-year-old has played 52 times for her country and has spent the past two seasons at Reading. She had […]

headline: Crystal Palace Women sign New Zealand international Indiah-Paige Riley
summary: Crystal Palace have signed New Zealand international forward Indiah-Paige Riley from PSV Eindhoven on a two-year deal. A former Brisbane Roar and Fortuna Hjørring player, the 22-year-old spent last season with Dutch side PSV. She […]

headline: Brazil beat women’s world champions to reach Olympic Final
summary: Brazil overcame Women’s World Cup holders Spain to set up an Olympic Gold Medal match with the USA on Saturday. The Brazilians struck early and late in the first half for a 2-0 interval lead, […]

headline: Two-time title winner Aimee Palmer signs for Saints Women
summary: Southampton have signed two-time Barclays Women’s Championship winning midfielder Aimee Palmer from Leicester City. She achieved promotion to the WSL with both Bristol City and Manchester United, scored five goals in 12 games while on […]

headline: Maria Edwards back with Blackburn Rovers Women

headline: Brazil Women eliminate Olympic hosts France
summary: Brazil beat France 1-0 in the Olympic Quarter-Finals, Germany and Spain went through on penalties and USA edged Japan after extra-time. Gabi Portilho made the breakthrough on 82 minutes for Brazil from Adriana’s through ball. […]
